attributes.action: scrap the t.v licence and force the bbc to fund itself!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is meant to force the bbc to stop charging extortionate prices for a television licence, and then provide inadequate programming. scrap the t.v licence!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap the t.v licence and force the bbc to fund itself!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20382


Prime Minister's Office
